channel.title: Teams Link Streamlining,
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Teams Link Streamlining,"

item.title: Teams Link Streamlining,
item.content:encoded: While editing the page for Ninja Art: Hottie Regeneration, while adding the teams that specifically give a chakra discount, that a lot of them are counter-intuitive to most other links, requiring the addition of "-bonus" at the end of the team name even if it doesn't have it. Would be nice to get it sorted out so that all such pages have the "-bonus" removed if not applicable, and all links tidied up appropriately.
